data.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.
data.author: Babe Ruth

data.quote: If people are doubting how far you can go, go so far that you can’t hear them anymore.
data.author: Michele Ruiz

data.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Smart people learn from everything and everyone, average people from their experiences, stupid people already have all the answers.
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: Leaders can let you fail and yet not let you be a failure.
data.author: Stanley McChrystal

data.quote: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.
data.author: Mother Teresa

data.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
data.author: Earl Nightingale

data.quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn’t have the power to say yes.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Everyone has inside them a piece of good news. The good news is you don’t know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is.
data.author: Anne Frank

data.quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there.
data.author: Dr. Wayne D. Dyer

data.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom
data.author: Oprah

data.quote: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
data.author: Pele

data.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, ‘Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
data.author: Steve Martin
